fulltext:
Pham Tran Phuong Thanh (Gina)
Corporate Event Specialist
Passionate and highly-effective event specialist with demonstrated 5 year experience in
managing all stages of innovative, branded and revenue-generating events. Having a strong
customer service orientation and an active commitment to continuous improvement and
quality standards. Excellent communication skills and comfortable working in a fast paced,
hands-on, growth oriented work environment. Currently looking for a managerial position that
offers the opportunity to advance career in event management.
phthanhpt@gmail.com
0963422554
Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
linkedin.com/in/pthanhpham
WORK EXPERIENCE
Corporate Event Specialist
Dow Chemical Vietnam LLC
05/2016 – 06/2019
Dow Inc. headquartered in Midland, Michigan, United States is one of the largest
multinational chemical corporation in the world.
Achievements/Tasks
Planned and produced 150+ memorable, premium-quality functions
within budget for corporate on-demand events, both internally and
externally, including: meetings & conferences, town halls, black-tie
galas, product seminars/workshops, press conferences, exhibitions,
sale kickoffs, banquets, ceremonies, networking cocktails, team
building, year-end parties, CSR and incentive trips, etc.
Managed logistics for Dow delegates attending sponsored VIP
national events: APEC Summit 2017 in Danang, World Economic
Forum on ASEAN 2018 in Hanoi;
Executed the biggest crucial project of Dow Headquarter in Vietnam:
Leadership in Action in Hanoi, September 2017, participated by 55
corporate leaders from multiple countries/regions, with budget over
US$ 100,000;
Developed and fostered strong relationships with media press, event
agencies, hotels and resorts, and other related partners.
Event Coordinator
Society of Petroleum Engineers (SPE Vietnam)
01/2015 – 04/2016
SPE is the largest non-profit association serving managers, engineers, scientists
and other professionals worldwide in the oil and gas industry.
Achievements/Tasks
Organised the annual biggest sport fundraising event in the Oil & Gas
industry - SPE Golf & Tennis Tournament 2015 in Vung Tau with
1,500 participants. Total fundraising value: USD$ 0.5 million in 3
days;
Coordinated monthly technical workshops and continuing education
courses with distinguished lecturers in the industry for SPE members
and non-members;
Implemented charity projects including bicycle donation to 120 poor
pupils in BVT, heart operations to 20 children, 03 book donation
campaigns, 01 kindergarten & 01 library sponsorship in Tra Vinh.
SKILLS
Event Production & Management
Conference & Meeting Planning
Budgeting & Cost Control
Problem-solving
Risk Management
Project Management
Strategic & Contingency Planning
Vendor Negotiation
Corporate Communication
Relationship Management
VOLUNTEER EXPERIENCE
Site Leader of RISE (Employee
Resources Group for Fresher &
Junior)
Dow Chemical Vietnam LLC
06/2018 – 06/2019
Event Coordinator for SPE Golf
& Tennis Tournament
Society of Petroleum Engineers
(SPE Vietnam)
2016 – 2018
HONOR AWARDS
2Q2018 Best Employee of the Quarter
Dow Chemical Vietnam LLC
3Q2017 Best Employee of the Quarter
Dow Chemical Vietnam LLC
Page 1 of 2
WORK EXPERIENCE
Media Buying Supervisor
Dentsu Media Vietnam
07/2014 – 12/2014
Dentsu Inc. is a Japanese international advertising and public relations joint stock
company headquartered in Tokyo.
Achievements/Tasks
Supervised and followed-up media buying contracts and invoices of
multiple channels (TV, print, OOH, digital);
Monitored print-ads by tracking deadlines and publication
specifications:
Managed the daily work flow of client campaigns, including proposal
development, campaign activation maintenance, and post-campaign
reporting;
Organised the sport event “Watch AFF Cup with Suzuki” in November
2014 for 16,000 participants at Military Zone 7 Stadium.
LANGUAGES
Vietnamese
Native or Bilingual Proficiency
English
Full Professional Proficiency
Chinese (Mandarin)
Limited Working Proficiency
EDUCATION
Bachelor of Science - International Business
Saimaa University of Applied Sciences
09/2009 – 05/2014
Lappenrata, Finland
Page 2 of 2
